column4: HELP!! can someone help me with this Please .... ERROR : " Unable to build the vmmon module. " Error I keep getting ? I think there is a problem with the compiler ??? I downloaded the essentials but same issue
are you attempting to install vmware?
watch the caps please. The problem with vmware at this time is that the vmmon module has a line in it which has to be changed. You can see which line as it also states the error.
if you google for this error, you will also find some pages suggesting the any-any patch. This will not work. (i've had the error myself)
I have tried the any any fix and the other fix that you have to adjust a file and that one doesn't work either..
what file did you adjust? How did you adjust it? What have you tried so far? Can you pastebin your error?
yeah I can pastebin it for you one sec
what does uname -r give you? (it's one line, paste here please)
this one i haven't seen. this one is from the any-any patch?
this is the other fix I tried : http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=770716
you have repacked vmmon.tar? If so, can you please untar it for me, and pastebin that entire file? or at least the section which contains the change?

you have to change a line like that yes. Not exactly to that. The changed line should read  << #include "linux/bitops.h" >>  instead of   << #include "asm/bitops.h >>  and not the entire line. Note that i surround commands and other functions with << and >> which should _NOT_ be added on commands
i have to go for a bit. I'll be back later.
